# AVAudioSessionInterruptionFlags_ShouldResume

**Global Variable**

Indicates that your audio session is active and ready for use.

## Declaration

```swift
var AVAudioSessionInterruptionFlags_ShouldResume: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

Your app can resume the interrupted audio operation. See [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/handling-audio-interruptions] for more information.
title: AVAudioSessionInterruptionFlags_ShouldResume
